short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin will link to the old style of genre browsing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin was made to take you to the legacy version of Netflix's genre browsing system. It will replace search links with the old school links. This old system was really nice and displayed more content than there current solution
